mapper.insert: INSERT OR REPLACE INTO `candlestick` ( `symbol`, `open_time`, `close_time`, `open`, `close`, `high`, `low`, `volume`, `quote_asset_volume`, `number_of_trades`, `taker_buy_base_asset_volume`, `taker_buy_quote_asset_volume`) VALUES ( #{candlestick.symbol, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{candlestick.openTime, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{candlestick.closeTime, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{candlestick.open, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{candlestick.close, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{candlestick.high, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{candlestick.low, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{candlestick.volume, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{candlestick.quoteAssetVolume, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{candlestick.numberOfTrades, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{candlestick.takerBuyBaseAssetVolume, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{candlestick.takerBuyQuoteAssetVolume, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT `symbol`, `open_time`, `close_time`, `open`, `close`, `high`, `low`, `volume`, `quote_asset_volume`, `number_of_trades`, `taker_buy_base_asset_volume`, `taker_buy_quote_asset_volume` FROM `candlestick` WHERE `open_time` >= #{candlestick.start_time, jdbcType=BIGINT} AND `open_time` <= #{candlestick.end_time, jdbcType=BIGINT}
